name: Yakuza Cats
description:
Yakuza Cats is a graphic adventure set in a 100% feline Tokyo. This original world mixes Ukiyo-e art with Gen Z aesthetics to tell the story of Tsukiko, a black cat that was abandoned in an alley as a baby and adopted by Mitsuo, a Yakuza leader. It is a coming of age story that puts the player through different ethical choices while tackling themes such as identity and prejudice. 

The game begins 18 years later after a tragic murder forces Tsukiko (the player) to dig deep into the underground community of Tokyo, rise on the Yakuza power ladder and figure out the mystery of his origin all while trying to protect his family and his integrity on the way.
